programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Iskandar scrambles to get his packing done before his flight. Tobias decides to tell Mandy about his illness. Chan remains moody about being stuck in hospital.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: In the second part of this series, Talking Point producer Chan Luo Er checks in on young adults across the island and finds out how we can build, and maintain strong emotional bonds.

programme.title: America's Got Talent S18
programme.desc: With an astronomical number of loyal fans eager to find out what's in store, judges Simon Cowell, Howie Mandel, Heidi Klum and Sofia Vergara - and host Terry Crews - are back with more diverse talent and show-stopping moments than ever before. With contestants of all backgrounds and ages competing for the life-changing, million dollar prize, we follow the hopeful performers, from singers and dancers to comedians, magicians and more, on their incredible journeys.

programme.title: The Cube S11
programme.desc: Contestants must battle to win a top prize of 250,000 pounds and each of them must complete apparently simple tasks while under the spotlight in a large perspex cube. Each task is worth a prize and the contestants will have to work hard to stay in the game.

programme.title: Masterchef Australia S11
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. Gary Mehigan, George Calombaris and Matt Preston served as judges.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S41
programme.desc: Pat Sajak hosts his final season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S1
programme.desc: In each episode, Adam Liaw is joined by 2 special guests - a combination of celebrity chefs, cooks and well-known personalities - and together they cook up a variety of dishes that centre around a nightly theme. They cook together sharing their knowledge, tips and tricks of the trade, for viewers to watch and follow their recipes at home. The Cook Up showcases all your favourite chefs, celebrities, culture, food and fun.

programme.title: Pokemon Ultimate Journeys: The Series [S25]
programme.desc: The stakes are higher than ever for Ash, Goh, and Chloe as they advance toward their goals! As the Pokemon World Coronation Series tournament heats up, intensive training is in store for Ash, Pikachu, and their Pokemon friends.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Turbo
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Two years after the International Blader's Cup, the story focuses on Aiger Akabane, a wild child that grew up in nature. After battling Valt Aoi the No.1 Blader, Aiger became inspired to become the No.1 Blader in the world.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Moley follows the misadventures of an optimistic young mole, as he travels the tunnels of his secret underground realm and falls into lots of good-natured trouble along the way. But with his perseverance, resourcefulness and helpful friends, Moley always finds an ingenious way to dig himself out of a crisis.

programme.title: Teddies
programme.desc: When the Teddies are heading out for their camping trip, it suddenly starts to storm. Meeks is disappointed, but Tizzy comes up with the brilliant idea of camping inside. Tizzy discovers that there is a bad smell in Teddytown - and it seems to follow her everywhere she goes. After investigating her friends, she realises that it's actually coming from her own stinky scarf!

programme.title: Sesame Street S54

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures
programme.desc: In his latest set of adventures, Andy travels to all corners of the globe, meeting an amazing new cast of animals - from chameleons in Sri Lanka to emperor penguins in Antarctica. Accompanied by tech wizard Jen and new information-seeking AI Scout, Andy travels the globe in a hi-tech expedition truck, a scientific research station that houses Jen's database of incredible facts about fauna and flora that inhabit our planet. In each episode, the team are sent on a mission by HQ to solve a puzzle.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S3
programme.desc: Farmer Haywire preps for a sheep contest but can't pick his top ten. He asks the Number Squad to count and separate the woolliest sheep for the competition. Mr. Mengo prepares for the yearly summer snowman tradition, using magic to create snow and snowman. programme.title: Filly Funtasia
programme.desc: Our heroine Rose and her Filly friends embark on fun exciting adventures as they start their school life at the Royal Magic Academy of Funtasia. They soon realise that their new magic skills will be of great use, as peril is near. Ages ago, during The Dark Battle, the evil Wranglum was absorbed by the Dark Mirror into a hidden Crystal Prison, which can only be unlocked by the Dark Crystal. Rose unknowingly holds the key and does not know how much danger she is in.

programme.title: The Space Race
programme.desc: Teams Bode and Galileo join Show Commander Afro on The Space Race. To get through to the next round the teams must navigate a Sphero ball around an asteroid laden board, build a workable Newton's Cradle, and show off their space trivia. Find out which team will blast off to the second stage!

programme.title: 长相思
programme.desc: 小夭向玱玹坦白忘不了涂山璟。西炎王让五王负责祭拜典礼，五王趁机让玱玹搬出紫金顶。丰隆约见小夭，如谈生意一般向她求婚，小夭回复她要好好考虑一下。馨悦劝小夭，答应结婚能帮助玱玹，也倾诉了自己身为辰荣王族后裔的苦衷。小夭与玱玹商量，决定嫁给丰隆，玱玹暗自痛苦。皓翎王收到信，察觉到小夭的不快乐，却也尊重小夭的选择，答应了婚事。涂山璟泪流满面地告诉防风邶小夭订婚，被防风邶讥讽。丰隆率中原各大氏族臣服于玱玹，向西炎王举玱玹为储君。禺疆劝玱玹立刻举兵，抢占先机，玱玹思索后回绝.

programme.title: 长风渡
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 大荣立朝，迄今不过两代。如今大荣皇帝缠绵病榻，中央对地方的控制日渐虚弱，国库亏空。十三州节度使割据，拥兵自重。风平浪静的表象之下，隐隐有暗流涌动。然而，这种山雨欲来的肃杀气氛，暂时似乎并未影响到一派富丽锦绣的徉州城。 徉州城内，对于十六岁的少女柳玉茹来说，她此时唯一挂心的事，便是叶家大公子叶世安不知何时归来。.

programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 讲述了唐中晚期，来自西南山区仵作世家的少女楚楚，为实现梦想独自来长安闯荡，参加仵作考试，遇到断案如神的安郡王萧瑾瑜。萧瑾瑜召集楚楚、景翊、冷月等人作为搭档揭秘探案。伴随着一个个的案件破解，团队一步步揭开谜底，最终破解了一场延续十八年的惊天大案的故事。.

programme.title: 宝贝父女兵
programme.desc: (PG) 戴志刚外号“金刚”，是个流氓，而且是个不太聪明的流氓，更是个虚有其表，即无勇也无谋的流氓。他进出牢房已经是家常便饭，监狱可以说是他真正的家。他结过婚，老婆婚后不久就跑了，留下个女儿，叫纯纯。金刚痛定思痛，不想女儿步自己后尘，同意纯纯让人收养，从此音信全无。.

programme.title: 秘食中国
programme.desc: 感受一个城市，最完美的打开方式就是寻味。城市的美味，与气候、人文、当地人的脾性，都无不相关。《秘食中国》将由混血星厨布兰特带您去到美食大省，通过探寻创新型的网红店、匠人型人气店、有特殊故事的小食铺等，多角度展现城市独特个性，品尝街头巷尾的神秘美味。每期节目最后，布兰特将带上当地特产回到“秘食厨房”，通过探店之旅以及对食材的理解，将这一特产进行创意料理或美食复刻。美味佳肴，居家即享！.

programme.title: 随懿深度行
programme.desc: (PG) 有别于传统观光旅游，《随懿深度行》着重「深度」体验与探秘。主持黎诺懿「公器私用」，借节目带同四位「女神」好友前赴马来西亚玩餐饱，从享受过程中也能有所得着！诺懿就着李佳芯、刘颖旋、高海宁、黄翠如的性格特质，度身订造专属的旅游主题，在怡保、金马仑、雪邦等地开展不一样的体验。.

programme.title: 最强岳母

programme.title: 老友万岁

programme.title: 老友万岁
programme.desc: Ping Pong不知如何向马票叔说出他患癌的事，只好选择暂时隐瞒，并开始带他去享受。马票叔虽然觉得奇怪，却不知真相。美芳知道马票叔的病情后，改变态度，让马票叔继续留下.

programme.title: 阿贤这么吃 S2
programme.desc: 《阿贤这么吃2 》走入庄园探寻马来西亚产制优质食材，看看各路生产者如何深耕在地物产，从咖啡、牛奶、鱼肉、蔬菜、鸡肉、发酵物到食用菌菇，还有我们刻板印象中唯有欧洲产才属优质品的起司、无花果、鱼子酱与巧克力等等，都将全然是马来西亚在地风土孕育的物产。阿贤也请教餐厅主厨如何将多元多样的风土食材，烹制成日常餐桌上的美味风景线，让土地与餐桌产生紧密连结，且透过不停梳理、复刻与重现，形塑马来西亚饮食的新在地.

programme.title: 空中访民情 2024
programme.desc: 走过十年，《空中访民情2024》将出现一辆精心布置的露营车，进驻新加坡各邻里。本地艺人白薇秀通过轻松对谈揭开六位部长鲜为人知的一面，并陪同部长穿街走巷探访民情、倾听民声。新系列从10月15日起，每逢星期二晚上8点30分，通过8频道与mewatch播出。你也可以通过8视界YouTube平台线上观看.

programme.title: 爱不虚拟
programme.desc: Angel突然接到机场警察来电，表示母亲Momoko出了事，和晓明急急赶至机场，惊见Momoko大闹海关。Momoko口口声声表示自己透过交友软件认识的新男友Neil是一名被困在月球的NASA太空人，正等着自己前去营救。本想到机场前往美国的她，因为买不到机票而想要强闯海关.

programme.title: 好睡好起
programme.desc: 《好睡好起》，颠覆大家对睡眠世界的想像，全城启动睡眠模式！家家有本难「睡」的经，「数绵羊」有科学根据？ 「睡眠债」怎样还？走进睡眠实验室，嘉宾「瞓身」参与，一觉醒来，有何惊人发现？人人会睡，但未必个个睡得好，想睡得好，要从睡前做起。从今天开始，大家《好睡好起》.

programme.title: 长风渡
programme.desc: (PG) 吉时已到，顾九思虽百般不愿，但为了顾家，在拜堂前最后一刻，身着大红婚服，从房间潇洒而出。玉茹和顾九思在众宾客的欢呼喝彩中完成了婚礼仪式，梁王使者见木已成舟，气的拂袖而去。既然已成为夫妻，顾九思还是信守承诺，帮助柳玉茹将聘礼转入了她名下。张月儿得知此事，在婚礼现场大闹，被柳宣训斥。.

programme.title: 御赐小仵作
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 讲述了唐中晚期，来自西南山区仵作世家的少女楚楚，为实现梦想独自来长安闯荡，参加仵作考试，遇到断案如神的安郡王萧瑾瑜。萧瑾瑜召集楚楚、景翊、冷月等人作为搭档揭秘探案。伴随着一个个的案件破解，团队一步步揭开谜底，最终破解了一场延续十八年的惊天大案的故事。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 IV
programme.desc: (PG)《詹姆士出走料理》以寻找詹姆士私厨菜单为节目主轴，为了寻找记忆中的美味料理，詹姆士将带领大家探索市场，品尝在地美味、寻访料理达人。并在节目中展现特殊食材的处理方式、尝试新的酱料或是新的料理作法，最后在节目片尾时作出一道『詹姆士创意料理』。.
